ALL_PROCESS_DEFINITIONS_NOT_EXECUTABLE.description: All process definition are set to be non-executable (property 'isExecutable' on process). This is not allowed.

PROCESS_DEFINITION_NOT_EXECUTABLE.description: Process definition is not executable. Please verify that this is intentional.

EXECUTION_LISTENER_IMPLEMENTATION_MISSIN.description: Element 'class' or 'expression' is mandatory on executionListener

EXECUTION_LISTENER_INVALID_IMPLEMENTATIO.description: Expression cannot be used when using 'onTransaction'

EVENT_LISTENER_IMPLEMENTATION_MISSING.description: Element 'class', 'delegateExpression' or 'throwEvent' is mandatory on eventListener

EVENT_LISTENER_INVALID_IMPLEMENTATION.description: Unsupported implementation type for event listener

EVENT_LISTENER_INVALID_THROW_EVENT_TYPE.description: Invalid or unsupported throw event type on event listener

START_EVENT_MULTIPLE_FOUND.description: Multiple none start events are not supported

START_EVENT_INVALID_EVENT_DEFINITION.description: Unsupported event definition on start event

SEQ_FLOW_INVALID_TARGET_DIFFERENT_SCOPE.description: Invalid target for sequenceflow, the target isn't defined in the same scope as the source

USER_TASK_LISTENER_IMPLEMENTATION_MISSIN.description: Element 'class' or 'expression' is mandatory on executionListener

SERVICE_TASK_INVALID_TYPE.description: Invalid or unsupported service task type

SERVICE_TASK_RESULT_VAR_NAME_WITH_DELEGA.description: 'resultVariableName' not supported for service tasks using 'class' or 'delegateExpression

SERVICE_TASK_MISSING_IMPLEMENTATION.description: One of the attributes 'implementation', 'class', 'delegateExpression', 'type', 'operation', or 'expression' is mandatory on serviceTask.

SEND_TASK_INVALID_IMPLEMENTATION.description: One of the attributes 'type' or 'operation' is mandatory on sendTask

SEND_TASK_INVALID_TYPE.description: Invalid or unsupported type for send task

SEND_TASK_WEBSERVICE_INVALID_OPERATION_R.description: Invalid operation reference for send task

SCRIPT_TASK_MISSING_SCRIPT.description: No script provided for script task

MAIL_TASK_NO_RECIPIENT.description: No recipient is defined on the mail activity

MAIL_TASK_NO_CONTENT.description: Text, html, textVar or htmlVar field should be provided

SHELL_TASK_NO_COMMAND.description: No shell command is defined on the shell activity

SHELL_TASK_INVALID_PARAM.description: Undefined parameter value for shell field

DMN_TASK_NO_KEY.description: No decision table reference key is defined on the dmn activity

EXCLUSIVE_GATEWAY_NO_OUTGOING_SEQ_FLOW.description: Exclusive gateway has no outgoing sequence flow

EXCLUSIVE_GATEWAY_CONDITION_NOT_ALLOWED_.description: Exclusive gateway has only one outgoing sequence flow. This is not allowed to have a condition.

EXCLUSIVE_GATEWAY_CONDITION_ON_DEFAULT_S.description: Default sequenceflow has a condition, which is not allowed

EXCLUSIVE_GATEWAY_SEQ_FLOW_WITHOUT_CONDI.description: Exclusive gateway has at least one outgoing sequence flow without a condition (which isn't the default one)

EVENT_GATEWAY_ONLY_CONNECTED_TO_INTERMED.description: Event based gateway can only be connected to elements of type intermediateCatchEvent

BPMN_MODEL_TARGET_NAMESPACE_TOO_LONG.description: The targetNamespace of the bpmn model must not contain more than {{maxLength}} characters

PROCESS_DEFINITION_ID_NOT_UNIQUE.description: The id of the process definition must be unique

PROCESS_DEFINITION_ID_TOO_LONG.description: The id of the process definition must not contain more than {{maxLength}} characters

PROCESS_DEFINITION_NAME_TOO_LONG.description: The name of the process definition must not contain more than {{maxLength}} characters

PROCESS_DEFINITION_DOCUMENTATION_TOO_LON.description: The documentation of the process definition must not contain more than {{maxLength}} characters

FLOW_ELEMENT_ID_TOO_LONG.description: The id of a flow element must not contain more than {{maxLength}} characters

SUBPROCESS_MULTIPLE_START_EVENTS.description: Multiple start events not supported for subprocess

SUBPROCESS_START_EVENT_EVENT_DEFINITION_.description: event definitions only allowed on start event if subprocess is an event subprocess

EVENT_SUBPROCESS_INVALID_START_EVENT_DEF.description: start event of event subprocess must be of type 'error', 'message' or 'signal'

BOUNDARY_EVENT_NO_EVENT_DEFINITION.description: Event definition is missing from boundary event

BOUNDARY_EVENT_CANCEL_ONLY_ON_TRANSACTIO.description: boundary event with cancelEventDefinition only supported on transaction subprocesses

BOUNDARY_EVENT_MULTIPLE_CANCEL_ON_TRANSA.description: multiple boundary events with cancelEventDefinition not supported on same transaction subprocess.

INTERMEDIATE_CATCH_EVENT_NO_EVENTDEFINIT.description: No event definition for intermediate catch event

EVENT_TIMER_MISSING_CONFIGURATION.description: Timer needs configuration (either timeDate, timeCycle or timeDuration is needed)

MULTI_INSTANCE_MISSING_COLLECTION.description: Either loopCardinality or loopDataInputRef/activiti:collection must been set

MESSAGE_INVALID_ITEM_REF.description: Item reference is invalid: not found

MESSAGE_EVENT_INVALID_MESSAGE_REF.description: Invalid 'messageRef': no message with that id can be found in the model

MESSAGE_EVENT_MULTIPLE_ON_BOUNDARY_SAME_.description: Multiple message events with same message id not supported

SIGNAL_EVENT_MISSING_SIGNAL_REF.description: signalEventDefinition does not have mandatory property 'signalRef'

SIGNAL_EVENT_INVALID_SIGNAL_REF.description: Invalid 'signalRef': no signal with that id can be found in the model

COMPENSATE_EVENT_INVALID_ACTIVITY_REF.description: Invalid attribute value for 'activityRef': no activity with the given id

COMPENSATE_EVENT_MULTIPLE_ON_BOUNDARY.description: Multiple boundary events of type 'compensate' is invalid

SIGNAL_INVALID_SCOPE.description: Invalid value for 'scope'. Only values 'global' and 'processInstance' are supported

DATA_ASSOCIATION_MISSING_TARGETREF.description: Targetref is required on a data association

DATA_OBJECT_MISSING_NAME.description: Name is mandatory for a data object

END_EVENT_CANCEL_ONLY_INSIDE_TRANSACTION.description: end event with cancelEventDefinition only supported inside transaction subprocess

DI_INVALID_REFERENCE.description: Invalid reference in diagram interchange definition: could not find {{bpmnReference}}

DI_DOES_NOT_REFERENCE_FLOWNODE.description: Invalid reference in diagram interchange definition: {{bpmnReference}} does not reference a flow node

DI_DOES_NOT_REFERENCE_SEQ_FLOW.description: Invalid reference in diagram interchange definition: {{bpmnReference}} does not reference a sequence flow

FLOW_ELEMENT_ASYNC_NOT_AVAILABLE.description: Async property is not available when asyncExecutor is disabled.

EVENT_TIMER_ASYNC_NOT_AVAILABLE.description: Timer event is not available when asyncExecutor is disabled.

SIGNAL_ASYNC_NOT_AVAILABLE.description: Async property is not available when asyncExecutor is disabled.
